original_text: If some of the branches have been broken off, and you, though a wild olive shoot, have been grafted in among the others and now share in the nourishing sap from the olive root,
korean_text: 또한 가지 얼마가 꺾이었는데 돌감람나무인 네가 그들 중에 접붙임이 되어 참감람나무 뿌리의 진액을 함께 받는 자가 되었은즉

sentences.original_text: If some of the branches have been broken off
and you, though a wild olive shoot
have been grafted in among the others
and now share in the nourishing sap
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 이제 양분이 되는 수액을 함께 받는다
